title: Email change without access *KINDA URGENT*
body: i recently had the displeasure of being tricked into phoney givaways. whoever i gave my account info too they know my password, so ive tried to change it. problem is i no longer have access to my email account anymore, so i cant change my email or my password

replies.body: I'd suggest hitting up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can! After you verify yourself with the account recovery questions, those agents should be able to help you make sure your account is safe and sound ^_^!
